item.title: Government
item.description: Overview # ß· This article is about Vekllei society Vekllei is positioned uniquely between the anarchy and control. This article looks at its government, which facilitates and manages these competing instincts. As the representative of the Vekllei state, and the body of its human interests, the Vekllei Government is second only to the Sovereign in its authority over Vekllei society. The Government of Vekllei refers to both the Administration of the Interior of the Vekllei Home Islands and the international governing body of the Vekllei Commonwealth.
